images.alt_text: AI-selected This image will serve as the main visual to capture attention and convey the essence of Thailand in autumn, showcasing warm beaches and sunny landscapes.
AI-selected These icons will be used to highlight special offers and deals within the email, enhancing the promotional aspect of the campaign.
AI-selected The logo will be placed in the header to establish brand identity and recognition throughout the email.
AI-selected This pattern will be used as a background to create a warm and inviting atmosphere throughout the email.

assetRequirements.content_context: depicting warm beaches, tropical fruits, and sunny weather typical of autumn in Thailand

assetRequirements.purpose: showcase the beauty of Thailand's beaches and culture

usageInstructions.placement: Place at top of email as main header image with full width
usageInstructions.context: Use in context of: Погрузитесь в осеннюю сказку Таиланда!. Ensure asset aligns with brand guidelines and campaign messaging.
usageInstructions.responsiveBehavior: Scale proportionally for mobile devices. Ensure minimum readable size on small screens.
